title: macOS Sierra
body:
Hello,

I downloaded dmg file for installing League of legends. I have macOS sierra and when I moved dmg file into application folder and opened installation I'm getting error message - "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more informations". 

There are just logs which were created in 2016.

How can I install League of legends on Mac device? Any clue where is the problem? How can I solve it?
Thank you,

J.

replies.body: This error can happen if your connection is having some trouble reaching our patching service, and might not be necessarily with anything you're doing.  Run over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and really know for sure.  Let me know if that does the trick!
